ModMetaData.name: [Pratt] Rimworld At War : All-in-One Weapons Pack (CE)
ModMetaData.author: Pratt
ModMetaData.description:
Rimworld At War : Complete Edition Weapons Pack (CE).
Include :
Commonwealth :
- Lee Enfield N°1 MkIII - Lee Enfield N°4 MkI - Lee Enfield N°1 MkIII scoped - Lee Enfield N°4 MkI-T scoped - L1A1 - Lewis Gun - Bren MkII - Sten MkII - Sten MkIII - Sten MkVI - Owen SMG - Thompson M1928 (30 rounds mag) - Weblew - Trench Club - Trench Club (nails) - Mills Grenade - PIAT - Vikers HMG (WWI) - Vikers HMG
France :
- Lebel M1886 - MAS 36 - MAS 49 - Lebel M1886 scoped - Double-barrelShotgun - Chauchat - FM M24-29 - AA 52 - Mousqueton Berthier M1916 - PM MAS 38 - Révolver Mle 1892 - PAMAS 35 - Mounted Hotchkiss M1914 - Improvised Grenade - Grenade F1 - Poignard de Tranchée
Germany :
- Mauser G98 - Mauser 98k - G43 - STG 44 - VG1-5 - Mauser G98 scoped - Mauser 98k scoped - MG 08-15 - MG 34 - MG 42 - FG 42 - MP 18 - MP 28 - MP 40 - MP 3008 - Mauser C96 - Luger P 08 - Walter P 38 - Mounted MG 08 - Stielhandgranate M16 - Stielhandgranate M24 - Panzerschreck - Shovel - MG 08 HMG - MG 34 HMG - MG 42 HMG
Japan :
- Type 99 Arisaka - Type 99 Arisaka scoped - Type 11 LMG - Type 99 LMG - Type 100 - Type 14 Nambu - Katana - Type 97
Soviet Block :
- Mosin-Nagant M91-30 - SVT 40 - Mosin-NagantM91-30 scoped - SVD Dragunov - AKM - AKMS - DP 27 - RPD - SKS - SKS w/Bayonet - PPSH 41 (drum) - PPSH 41 (stick) - PPS 43 - K50M - PM MAT 49 converted in 7.62TT - RGD-33 - RPG-2 - TT-33
USA :
- Springfield 1903 - M1 Garand - M14 - Springfield 1903 scoped - M40 - M16 - M1897 Trench Gun - BAR M1918 - BAR M1918A2 - M1919A6 - M60 - Thompson M1928 - Thompson M1928A1 - Thompson M1A1 - M3 "Grease Gun" - M3A1 "Grease Gun" - SW 76 - USM1 Carbine - USM2 Carbine - XM177 - Colt 1911 - US 1917 Trench Knife - MkII Grenade - M79 - M9A1 "Bazooka" - M72 LAW - M1917 HMG - M1917A1 HMG - M1919A4 HMG
